search_term: Find the official pricing page URL for LionDesk (liondesk-crm.com). Only provide the exact URL to the pricing page, not a summary of pricing information.
response_text: The exact URL for the LionDesk pricing page is: [https://www.liondesk.com/pricing](https://www.liondesk.com/pricing) .

*   ![Image 22: Lone Wolf Relationships screenshots on a computer desktop - Background image](https://www.liondesk.com/sites/default/files/2025-03/liondesk-is-now-relationships-q1-2025-blog-banner.jpg)
    
    Meet Lone Wolf Relationships: Real estate’s new and simplified contact management system
    ========================================================================================
    
    By **[Lone Wolf Technologies](https://www.liondesk.com/user-profile/lone-wolf-technologies)**
    
    March 19, 2025
    

![Image 23: Lone Wolf Relationships screenshots on a computer desktop - Thumbnail image](https://www.liondesk.com/sites/default/files/styles/image_col_12/public/2025-03/liondesk-is-now-relationships-q1-2025-blog-thumbnail.jpg?itok=xNGj27NH)

LionDesk CRM users: **[Log in here](https://www.lwolf.com/login)**

Success in real estate hinges on building and maintaining strong client connections. But managing the complexities of those relationships amidst the daily grind can be a real challenge.

Traditional CRMs aim to help but often complicate things with clunky interfaces, poor mobile access, duplicate data, and steep learning curves.

That’s why we created [**Lone Wolf Relationships**](https://www.liondesk.com/products/relationships), a new and improved client management platform designed for real estate agents who want to work smarter, not harder. Now part of Lone Wolf Foundation, Relationships offers a sleek, intuitive interface that simplifies client management, so you can stay connected and focused on what matters most—closing deals.

Simpler workflows. Advanced features. Better user experience.
-------------------------------------------------------------

Relationships combines smart features with simpler workflows as you manage and nurture your clients. In fact, Relationships streamlines key client management processes by up to 75% fewer clicks!

Here are just a handful of our favorite Relationships features that will make your contact management and client nurture a breeze:

*   **AI-powered email prompts & refinements:** Effortlessly craft polished, engaging emails that impress clients with just a few clicks.
*   **Automate actions on contact timelines:** Access automated communication tools for email follow-ups, reminders for open houses, and personalized outreach based on client details.
*   **Categorize contacts for easy management:** Track all client interactions, tasks, lead sources, and opportunities in one place. Plus, manage notes, lead sources, and birthdays, ensuring no client is overlooked.
*   **Streamlined emailing experience:** Save time by creating reusable templates you can use again, plus Relationships syncs with your Google or Outlook so you can send/receive emails from either easier.

And so much more.

* * *

Get started with Lone Wolf Relationships today.
-----------------------------------------------

**Current LionDesk users:** Contact data can be migrated immediately from your LionDesk account right into Relationships easily.

The process is simple:

1.  Log into LionDesk
2.  Connect your Lone Wolf account
3.  Migrate your contact data into Contacts

In real estate, strong client relationships are everything—but managing them in an over-complicated database shouldn’t be a struggle. Relationships will make your workflow simpler, your communication smarter, and your client interactions more seamless and genuine. Explore Relationships today and see the difference for yourself!

[**Explore Relationships**](https://www.liondesk.com/pricing#)

_Relationships is available today in Lone Wolf Foundation, the platform that brings you one login, one workflow, and one client database for your most-used real estate apps._

Do Not Share My Personal Information
------------------------------------

Our Privacy Policy describes the circumstances in which we may share your information with third parties and explains that certain companies may place tracking technologies like cookies on our sites. Cookies allow those companies to receive information about your browsing activity and can help deliver ads and content that are more relevant to you. The use of behavioral advertising cookies may constitute a “sharing” under California law. To disable the behavioral advertising cookies and trackers on this website toggle “Targeting / Advertising” cookies to “off” and click “Confirm My Choices.” Note that your selection is specific to the device, website, and browser you are using. If you delete your browser cache or visit this website from a different browser, you will need to opt out again.

Do not sell my information

Back

### About Cookies

Cookies are small text files that can be used by websites to make the experience of the user more efficient. The law states that we can store cookies on your device if they are strictly necessary for the operation of this site. For all other types of cookies, we need your permission. This site uses different types of cookies. Some cookies are placed by third party services that appear on our pages. You can at any time, change or withdraw your consent from the Cookie Declaration on our website. Learn more about who we are, how you can contact us, and how we process personal data in our Privacy Policy?

##### Necessary

Necessary cookies help make a website usable by enabling basic functions like page navigation and access to secure areas of the website. The website cannot function properly without these cookies.

8 | View

##### Preferences

Preference cookies enable a website to remember information that changes the way the website behaves or looks, like your preferred language or the region that you are in.

1 | View

##### Statistics

Statistic cookies help website owners to understand how visitors interact with websites by collecting and reporting information anonymously.

3 | View

##### Marketing

Marketing cookies are used to track visitors across websites. The intention is to display ads that are relevant and engaging for the individual user and thereby more valuable for publishers and third-party advertisers.

1 | View

##### Unclassified

Unclassified cookies are cookies that we are in the process of classifying, together with the providers of individual cookies.

38 | View

We use Cookies

About Cookies
=============

  Cookie List

We use cookies to personalize content and ads, to provide social media features and to analyze our traffic. We also share information about your use of our site with our social media, advertising and analytics partners who may combine it with other information that you have provided to them or that they have collected from your use of their services. You consent to our cookies if you continue to use our website.

Allow All Disable All

 Necessary Always Active

Necessary cookies help make a website usable by enabling basic functions like page navigation and access to secure areas of the website. The website cannot function properly without these cookies.

 Preferences

Preference cookies enable a website to remember information that changes the way the website behaves or looks, like your preferred language or the region that you are in.

 Statistics

Statistic cookies help website owners to understand how visitors interact with websites by collecting and reporting information anonymously.

 Marketing

Marketing cookies are used to track visitors across websites. The intention is to display ads that are relevant and engaging for the individual user and thereby more valuable for publishers and third-party advertisers.

 Unclassified

Unclassified cookies are cookies that we are in the process of classifying, together with the providers of individual cookies.
